text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly identifies that the Belgian officers acted under Article 9 and that they sought necessary information from the vessel, which aligns directly with the requirement of criterion 3: 'Identifies that under Article 9(5) of the Convention, if an authorized officer has reason to believe that a vessel of any Contracting Party is not complying with the provisions of the convention, he may seek to obtain the necessary information from the vessel.'
